text: The Most Honourable Dame Marguerite, Lady Pindling, (n√©e McKenzie; born June 26, 1932) is a Bahamian politician. She was the Governor-General of the Bahamas from 8 July 2014 to 28 June 2019 She is the second female Governor- General of The Bahamas after Dame Ivy Dumont. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Governors-General of the Bahamas
title: Marguerite Pindling
